## SendableProtocol.liquidateUpTo() method

Liquidate the least collateralized Troves up to a maximum number.

**Signature:**

```typescript
liquidateUpTo(maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate: number): Promise<SentProtocolTransaction<S, ProtocolReceipt<R, LiquidationDetails>>>;
```
